00004 #define ELF32_R_SYM(i) ((i)>>8)
00005 #define ELF32_R_TYPE(i) ((unsigned char)(i))
00006 #define ELF32_R_INFO(s,t) (((s)<<8)+(unsigned char)(t))
00007 
00008 #define ELF32_ST_BIND(i) ((i)>>4)
00009 #define ELF32_ST_TYPE(i) ((i)&0xf)
00010 #define ELF32_ST_INFO(b,t) (((b)<<4)+((t)&0xf))

00087  */

00089         unsigned char e_ident[EI_NIDENT];

00100         Elf32_Half e_shentsize;

00102         Elf32_Half e_shstrndx;
